==Technical information==
==Technical information==
â
[[Image:ESET NOD32 Antivirus.png|Right|thumb|200px|ESET NOD32 Antivirus.png]]NOD32 is written largely in [[Assembly language|assembly code]],<ref>[http://www.eset.com/company/article/(NOD32)-an-extremely-fast-Hi-Performance-Scanning-Engine---interview-with-Randy-Abrams/1497.php?contentID=1497 ESET - Essential Security against Evolving Threats<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> which contributes to its low use of system resources and high scanning speed. NOD32 can process more than 23MB per second while scanning on a [[Pentium 4]] based PC<ref>[http://www.wilderssecurity.com/showpost.php?p=822533&postcount=26 Wilders Security Forums - View Single Post - Fun with NOD32<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> and, on average, uses less than 20MB of memory in total.<ref>[http://www.eset.com/products/index.php]</ref> The physical RAM used is often just a third of that.<ref>[http://www.wilderssecurity.com/showpost.php?p=828805&postcount=5 Wilders Security Forums - View Single Post - memory utilisation<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
+
[[Image:ESET NOD32 Antivirus.png|Right|thumb|200px|ESET NOD32 Antivirus]]NOD32 is written largely in [[Assembly language|assembly code]],<ref>[http://www.eset.com/company/article/(NOD32)-an-extremely-fast-Hi-Performance-Scanning-Engine---interview-with-Randy-Abrams/1497.php?contentID=1497 ESET - Essential Security against Evolving Threats<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> which contributes to its low use of system resources and high scanning speed. NOD32 can process more than 23MB per second while scanning on a [[Pentium 4]] based PC<ref>[http://www.wilderssecurity.com/showpost.php?p=822533&postcount=26 Wilders Security Forums - View Single Post - Fun with NOD32<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> and, on average, uses less than 20MB of memory in total.<ref>[http://www.eset.com/products/index.php]</ref> The physical RAM used is often just a third of that.<ref>[http://www.wilderssecurity.com/showpost.php?p=828805&postcount=5 Wilders Security Forums - View Single Post - memory utilisation<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
According to a 2005 [[Virus Bulletin]] test, NOD32 performs scans two to five times faster than other antivirus competitors.<ref>[http://www.findarticles.com/p/articles/mi_m0EIN/is_2005_Nov_8/ai_n15783097 ESET's NOD32 Achieves 34th Consecutive Virus Bulletin 100% Award; NOD32 Is Recognized for Flawless Virus Protection; Performs Scans Five Times Faster than Symantec Antivirus | Business Wire | Find Articles at BNET.com<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref><ref>[http://www.newswiretoday.com/news/11927/ Newswire / Press Release: ESET NOD32 Wins Virus Bulletin 100% Award Once Again - IT Security/Anti-Spam | NewswireToday<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
According to a 2005 [[Virus Bulletin]] test, NOD32 performs scans two to five times faster than other antivirus competitors.<ref>[http://www.findarticles.com/p/articles/mi_m0EIN/is_2005_Nov_8/ai_n15783097 ESET's NOD32 Achieves 34th Consecutive Virus Bulletin 100% Award; NOD32 Is Recognized for Flawless Virus Protection; Performs Scans Five Times Faster than Symantec Antivirus | Business Wire | Find Articles at BNET.com<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref><ref>[http://www.newswiretoday.com/news/11927/ Newswire / Press Release: ESET NOD32 Wins Virus Bulletin 100% Award Once Again - IT Security/Anti-Spam | NewswireToday<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
